description: Revenue generation through customer acquisition and retention

typical_processes.name: Lead Qualification Process
typical_processes.description: Converting raw leads into qualified opportunities

typical_processes.name: Sales Forecasting Process
typical_processes.description: Predicting future revenue based on pipeline

typical_processes.name: Deal Execution Process
typical_processes.description: Moving opportunities through sales stages to close

typical_processes.name: Pipeline Management Process
typical_processes.description: Tracking and managing deals in progress

common_outputs.name: Sales Forecast
common_outputs.description: Predicted revenue for upcoming period (monthly, quarterly, or annual)
common_pain_points: Forecasts are consistently inaccurate (off by >20%)
Takes too long to generate (days instead of hours)
Relies on manual data entry and spreadsheet consolidation
Inconsistent methodology across reps and regions
No visibility into forecast assumptions
Can't drill down into forecast components

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train reps on forecasting methodology, hire data analyst
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Implement AI-powered forecasting, automate data aggregation
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize forecasting process, implement regular reviews

common_outputs.name: Sales Pipeline Reports
common_outputs.description: Current state of deals in progress, showing stages, values, and probabilities
common_pain_points: Data is stale or incomplete (reps don't update CRM)
Inconsistent stage definitions across teams
Hard to get real-time view of pipeline health
Can't trust the data for decision-making
Manual cleanup required before sharing with leadership

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train reps on CRM hygiene, implement accountability
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize stage definitions, mandatory update cadence

common_outputs.name: Qualified Leads
common_outputs.description: Vetted prospects that meet criteria for sales engagement (MQLs/SQLs)
common_pain_points: Lead quality is inconsistent (low conversion to opportunities)
AEs waste time on unqualified leads
SDRs use different qualification criteria
Missing key information at handoff
Long lag between lead capture and qualification

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train SDRs on qualification framework, hire specialists

common_outputs.name: Sales Proposals
common_outputs.description: Customized proposals/quotes for prospects including pricing and terms
common_pain_points: Takes too long to create proposals (days per proposal)
Inconsistent pricing across reps
Errors in calculations or terms
Outdated templates and content
No visibility into proposal status after sending

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on proposal tools, create content library
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: CPQ automation, AI content generation, e-signature

common_outputs.name: Commission Calculations
common_outputs.description: Sales compensation calculations based on deals closed and quotas
common_pain_points: Frequent errors leading to disputes
Takes weeks to calculate and distribute
Complex rules hard to implement in spreadsheets
No transparency for reps (can't see their own calculations)
Manual reconciliation with finance systems

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire commission specialist, reduce manual work
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Simplify commission structure, implement validation checks

common_outputs.name: Territory Assignments
common_outputs.description: Assignment of accounts/regions to sales reps for coverage
common_pain_points: Unbalanced territories (some reps have much easier/harder territories)
Frequent disputes over account ownership
Manual process takes weeks to complete
Hard to model 'what-if' scenarios
Changes are disruptive and poorly communicated

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Hire territory planning specialist, improve communication
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Define clear rules, implement regular review cadence
